name: Popcorn Maker | Mozilla Popcorn
caption: mozillapopcorn.org
description: Popcorn Maker is a creative tool that makes authoring interactive media pages as easy as point and click.  Coming November 2012 Popcorn Maker 1.0 will empower you to make cool web-based media, whether you’re a beginner or pro. With over 20 plugins—ranging from Twitter to Google Maps to video process...

data.message: Mozilla is the best. I blog about their recent projects http://www.amreldib.com/2012/01/mozilla-beyond-firefox.html
I didn't like the Popcorn Project but i love the Hackasaurus one
